description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 10/03/2005

Ridge informs Eric that he and Taylor have entered marriage counseling. Brooke tries to convince Bridget that Stephanie is lying about what occurred in Big Bear with Nick. Stephanie reminds Bridget of all of the pain Brooke has caused her and the two begin to tussle.  Eric and Ridge separate them, prompting Stephanie to shriek that Brooke is trying to steal Bridget’s husband again. Stephanie leaves the room as Eric bans Stephanie from the building. Massimo knows Nick is still consumed with thoughts of Brooke. Massimo advises his son to move out of town with Bridget. However, Nick refuses to do so. Later, Stephanie confronts Nick about seeing him with Brooke in Big Bear, when Bridget walks in.
